reviewText: The day they allowed beauticians the use of clippers was a sad one.  As a barber for 53 years, I have forgotten more about "clipper cutting" than this bloke(s) will ever know.
Provides detailed enough instructions for non-professionals.
Absolutely wonderful, a must have to sharpen your clipper cutting skills. I highly recommend this video.

Highly recommend this DVD for all fellow hair stylists as it covers a lot of the hair clipping techniques that are performed everyday in our salon. A great way to get your head around the most effective ways to cut mens hair particularly if you're just starting out and learning the different basic cuts. The simple yet detailed instructions are easy to follow, this DVD is a must have!
